thread.title: The terrifying moment part of a plane's engine breaks off during take off
thread.title_full: WTF | Watch: The terrifying moment part of a plane's engine breaks off during take off - entertainment.ie

author: David O'Shaughnessy
title: The terrifying moment part of a plane's engine breaks off during take off
text:
If the gremlin on the wing of the airplane episode of 'The Twilight Zone' freaks you out, prepare to be utterly petrified.
Carlos Troncoso uploaded this video to YouTube yesterday which shows the one thing you really don't want to see happen during a take off.
According to Reddit, it was "just" an access hatch for the engine and was structurally significant to the plane but would require replacing. According to Troncoso, the plane did a turnaround and returned to the ground shortly after take off.
The images of the aftermath are just as terrifying.
accidente sky Maybe skip this if you plan on flying anywhere any time soon. We don't know how he stayed so calm.
Via Reddit
